plays.text: Goal scored by Scott Thornton assisted by Mike Ricci and Scott Hannan
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding Eric Lindros
Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for Elbowing Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Vladimir Malakhov 2 minutes for Slashing Gary Suter
Penalty to Tomas Kloucek 2 minutes for Crosschecking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Brad Stuart assisted by Teemu Selanne and Gary Suter
Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Holding Radek Dvorak
Penalty to Adam Graves 2 minutes for Tripping Sandy McCarthy
Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Crosschecking Petr Nedved
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Holding Eric Lindros
Penalty to Bryan Berard 2 minutes for High Sticking Niklas Sundstrom
Goal scored by Brian Leetch assisted by Mark Messier
Penalty to Andreas Johansson 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd Harvey
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Adam Graves and Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Marco Sturm
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Holding Theo Fleury
Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Stuart
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Holding Petr Nedved
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Holding Petr Nedved
Penalty to Teemu Selanne 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse unassisted
Penalty to Tomas Kloucek 2 minutes for Roughing Niklas Sundstrom
